.. py:function:: check_setting_language_code(app_configs, **kwargs)

   Error if LANGUAGE_CODE setting is invalid.


.. py:function:: check_setting_languages(app_configs, **kwargs)

   Error if LANGUAGES setting is invalid.


.. py:function:: check_setting_languages_bidi(app_configs, **kwargs)

   Error if LANGUAGES_BIDI setting is invalid.


.. py:function:: check_language_settings_consistent(app_configs, **kwargs)

   Error if language settings are not consistent with each other.
